data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of Anacolini (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Prioninae) from Bolivia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos-Silva, Antonio, Galileo, Maria Helena M. (2018): A new genus and species of Anacolini (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Prioninae) from Bolivia. Zootaxa 4379 (1): 140-144, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4379.1.10
